// ** Reactstrap Imports import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardBody, CardText } from 'reactstrap' const BlockquoteStyling = () => { return ( Blockquotes styling Add a .border-[start / end]-[color] .border-[start / end]-3 helper classes, where color can be any color from Vuexy Admin color palette.
